alert.note: Alert for Christian; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 2:37PM EST until January 09 at 5:35PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville -68/80 affecting Trigg and Christian Counties. For the Little River...including Hopkinsville - 68/80...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville - 68/80. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage later this afternoon and continue falling to 5.5 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.4 feet on 02/05/2014. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
